price: Ou antes que diga: "Se Allah me houvesse guiado, haveria sido dos piedosos"
arabic: أَوۡ تَقُولَ لَوۡ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ هَدَىٰنِي لَكُنتُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: aw taqūla law anna al-laha hadānī lakuntu mina al-mutaqīna
